DOC.brief_summary: OBJETIVE : To study influence musicotherapy reduction fatigue related cancer patient breast 's gynecology 's cancer , radiotherapy treatment .
DOC.brief_title: Musicotherapy Reduction Fatigue Women With Breast Gynecological Cancer Under Radiotherapy
DOC.detailed_description: METHODS : This randomize control study ( Control Group - CG e musicotherapy Group - MTG ) wich value fatigue , life 's quality , anxiety , depression use evaluative instrument Functional Assessment Cancer Therapy : Fatigue ( FACT-F ) , Beck Depression Inventory ( BDI ) , Beck Anxiety Inventory ( BAI ) three different moment ( first week radiotherapy , intermediate phase 's week last week radiotherapy ) patient group . Women allocate MTG , addition scale describe , answer musicotherapy Questionary ( MQ ) , Subjective Impression Subject 's Questionary last meeting . Musicotherapy session individual last average 40 minute . Music therapeutic technique use Musical Audition ( MA ) Therapeutic Musical Audition ( TMA ) .
DOC.criteria: Patients breast gynecological cancer indication radiotherapy Performance status 0,1 Hemoglobin < 10mg/dl Patients psychotherapy study Use antidepressants Patients present one cancer type
